career_application.name: Your name
career_application.notes: Specialized in real-time data visualization and safety analysis systems. Built a comprehensive balloon tracking and air traffic monitoring application using Flask, JavaScript, and Leaflet.js. Demonstrated expertise in API integration (OpenSky Network), geospatial data processing, and safety-critical systems. Collaborated effectively to implement complex features including real-time aircraft tracking, safety analysis algorithms, and interactive mapping solutions. Strong focus on user experience and data-driven decision making for flight operations.
